name: Calculator
title: Using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, you can create a calculator project that enables users to perform basic arithmetic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division, providing a user-friendly interface for calculations on the web.

name: Quiz App
title: By utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, you can develop an engaging Quiz app that allows users to answer multiple-choice questions, provides instant feedback on their responses, and calculates their final score, making learning and assessment interactive on the web.

name: Music App
title: Leveraging HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, you can create a Music App that enables users to browse and play their favorite songs create playlists  and customize the visual appearance of the player offering a seamless and enjoyable music listening experience on the web.

name: Knowledge Book
title: By integrating React.js, local storage, and Firebase,develop an online book selling website where users can browse and purchase books, store their preferences locally, and utilize Firebase for secure user authentication, real-time updates, and seamless order management, providing an efficient and personalized e-commerce experience for book enthusiasts.
